Package game.consume

Class GoldenRunes

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.consume.ConsumeItem
game.consume.GoldenRunes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
public class GoldenRunes
extends ConsumeItem
Golden Rune is an item that can be found in the ground. Golden Rune can be picked up and dropped. Golden Rune can be consume by player to earn an amount of rune. Is it possible to eat a rune? Created by: Yeoh Ming Wei

    • addGoldenRunesToRandomLocation

      public void addGoldenRunesToRandomLocation​(GameMap map, Actor actor)
      Adds golden runes to random locations on the given game map. Gets the size of the map and then the item is added if that map doesn't have any collusion.
      Parameters:
      map - the game map
      actor - the actor to add the seeds for

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpAction getPickUpAction​(Actor actor)
      A pick up action for GoldenRune. Note: I use this method so that I can know the amount of golden rune. It is used at consume action which requires the amount.
      Overrides:
      getPickUpAction in class Item
      Returns:
      a new PickUpItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.
